attributes.action: Change the Recommended Retail Price to Maximum Retail Price.
attributes.background:
My idea to to stop service stations and cinemas and other establishments charging over the RRP for products. Cinemas charge over double than supermarkets for certain items.
And I'm sure you all know how expensive service stations are. I personally think this needs to stop

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
